title: Demands of the Sackville-Bagginses (2C40)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot an [Isengard] minion. Plays to your support area. Each time a [Shire] ally exerts, add (1).
Lore:	“In the middle of the commotion, the Sackville-Bagginses arrived.”
Rarity:	C
